verses.roman:
karṇāmṛta, vidyāpati, śrī-gīta-govinda
ihāra śloka-gīte prabhura karāya ānanda

synonyms: karṇāmṛta—the book Kṛṣṇa-karṇāmṛta; vidyāpati—the author Vidyāpati; śri-gīta-govinda—the book Śrī Gīta-govinda by Jayadeva Gosvāmī; ihāra—of these; śloka-gīte—verses and songs; prabhura—for Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karāya—create; ānanda—happiness.
translation: The Lord especially liked to hear Bilvamaṅgala Ṭhākura's Kṛṣṇa-karṇāmṛta, the poetry of Vidyāpati and Śrī Gīta-govinda by Jayadeva Gosvāmī. Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu felt great pleasure in His heart when His associates chanted verses from these books.
